article.title: SAIC's GPS Contract Modified
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Air Force Space & Missile Systems Center

article.text: Science Applications International Corporation, McLean, Virginia, is being awarded a $31,715,771 (face value) firm-fixed-price and modification contract to extend the Global Positioning System systems engineering and integration contract by nine months.Â Air Force Space & Missile and Missile Systems Center, Global Positioning Systems Directorate, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
